result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Participation and successful completion of Door County Treatment Court. No further law violations.

Deferred Judgement Agreement.

1:57 PM Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena in court, in custody.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Minute sheet. State gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant. Defendant is accepting States offer for a DJA. Defendant enters no contest plea to Ct(s). 1-3.  Court questions Defendant on rights, finds pleas made freely and voluntarily, accepts plea(s) and finds defendant guilty of Ct(s).1-3, withholds acceptance of plea on Ct(s). 1-3.  Court reviews conditions contained within DJA, approves DJA. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference on June 6, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

9:06 AM  Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel indicates defendant has applied to Treatment Court, that application is on going.  Defendant is also serving a sanction until the beginning of June, requests another status the first week in June to see where things are at. Defense may be arguing bond at that next hearing.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
from defendant requesting bond modification
Status conference on May 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant in custody.
Cash bond increased from $500 to $1,000.  Same conditions apply.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release.  Drug Monitoring.  No contact direct or indirect with K.P.B.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.   ($250 already posted.  Defendant needs to post an additional $750 cash)

11:30 AM Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, cancels warrant.  State requests bonds in all files be increased by $500 cash.  Atty Viel gives argument on bond.  Court makes statement, converts $500 cash bond to $1,000 cash.  Same conditions apply as previously set.
Status conference scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:16 AM  Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena not in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, questions Atty Viel and defendant's whereabouts.  Atty Viel has no explanation for defendants non appearance today.  State indicates there is already a warrant in this file for failure to comply with bond.

Defendant needs to post an additional $250 cash by 4:30 pm on 3/31/22.  If not posted, defendant is to turn herself into the Door County Jail..  Conditions of bond as previously set remain in effect - Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release.  Drug Monitoring.  No contact direct or indirect with K.P.B.. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.

11:57 AM   Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, reviews State's motion to modify defendant's bond.  Atty Viel gives argument on bond, requests cash bond not be increased or increased to an amount less than the $500 the State is requesting.  State doesn't feel defendant is complying with the Court's order regarding bond, requests bond be increased as requested in their motion.  Court amends cash bond from $250 to $500 cash.  Defendant to post the additional $250 by 4:30 pm today at either the Door County Jail or the Door County Clerk of Courts office.  If bond not paid by 4:30 pm today, defendant is to turn herself into the Door County Jail.  If bond is posted, defendant is to have the patch changed by 4:30 pm on Friday, 4/01/22.
Bail/bond hearing on March 31, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Motion to Modify Bond.     Check with Atty Viel about putting this on calendar for 11:45 a.m. Thursday, March 31. DTE
by Bobbie Warrichaiet
Status conference on April 11, 2022 at 09:15 am.
New bond set.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Drug Monitoring. No contact direct or indirect with K.P.B.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.
Amended to cash bond.

Court addresses State's motion to modify defendants bond to a $500 cash bond.  State indicates they are willing to stipulate to a $250 cash bond, makes statement.  Atty Viel indicates they are not contesting the $250 cash bond, makes statement.  Court amends bond to $250 cash bond, same conditions apply.

10:00 AM   Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena appeared in court, Attorney Shannon Viel appeared in court for Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena, Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel feels matter will resolve short of trial, still working on a resolution with the State, requests another status.
Status conference scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Order to Modify Bond
Motion to Modify Bond Faith Cervantes-Camarena.       Will address on 3/3/22. DTE
Status conference on March 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release.  Drug Monitoring.   No contact direct or indirect with K.P.B.. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.
Converted to signature bond.

Atty Viel makes statement, requests cash bond be converted to a signature bond and addi drug monitoring as a condition of bond along with the other conditions already set by the Court.  State agreeable to modifying cash bond to a signature bond as long as drug monitoring is added as a conditions of bond.   Court amends cash bond to a signature bond, adds drug monitoring as conditions of defendants bond.  All other conditions remain as previously set.

Defense waives reading of the complaint, enters not guilty plea.  Court finds probable cause for bindover.

1:00 pm. Defendant Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena appeared by video from the Door County Jail, Attorney Shannon Viel appeared with Faith Marie Cervantes-Camarena, Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared in court for State of Wisconsin.
